name: Merge Blocks 3D
description:
Available on # ASMR PUZZLE : SHOOT & MERGE!

New type ASMR puzzle! Swipe & shoot block to merge with same kind of block and make bigger one. Empty your head and relax and immerse yourself in the world of ASMR physics puzzles.

How high & bigger block can you make? Try it right now!

`Merge Blocks 3D` is a simple, easy puzzle game that can be enjoyed by everyone in the family!

# HOW TO PLAY
  • Swipe left and right to fire when released
  • When the same blocks are combined, it merges to a higher block
  • Combos are activated when blocks are combined in succession
  • A huge bonus drops when you play high combos
  • Use items with amazing effects such as magnets and bombs
  • Collect all the various block themes
# FEATURES
  • NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM! Enjoy block puzzle anytime, anywhere!
  • FREE TO PLAY & Suitable for all ages.
  • NO penalties & time limits; You can enjoy Block Puzzle at your own pace!
# NOTES
  • `Merge Blocks 3D` supports mobile phones & tablet PCs.
  • `Merge Blocks 3D` contains ads varying from banners, interstitials, video to house ads.
  • `Merge Blocks 3D` is free to play, however, you may purchase Ad-Free item.

Need Help? Have Questions?
We value your feedback! Please contact us at games@unit5soft.com

This game supports 'English', '한국어', '日本語', '中文简体', '中文繁體', 'Deutsch', 'français', 'Español', 'Italian', 'Portuguese', 'Indonesian', 'Русский', 'Turkish', 'ไทย', 'Tiếng Việt'.
